Begin OddRumorScript

short done

if ( done == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( PCWerewolf == 1 )
	enable
endif

if ( PCWerewolf <= 0 )
	disable
endif
	 
;if ( GetJournalIndex BM_WolfGiver < 10 )
	if ( onactivate == 1 )
		Journal "BM_WolfGiver" 10
		set done to 1
		activate
	endif
endif
 

End OddRumorScript
